*div1 type="summary"* *p*Administrator's sale of land, June 11, 1827. J. B. Miller, admr. of Thos. Gray.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*sale of land*/p*
*p*Will be offered at public sale in the Town of *location_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="08-04-1827">first Saturday in August next*/date_mentioned* for Cash on a credit of six months giving Bond with approved security and a lien on the *location_mentioned*land*/location_mentioned* untill paid all the interest of *person_mentioned*Thomas Gray deceased*/person_mentioned* in and to the *location_mentioned*upper half of a League of land situate on the west side of the River Bernard*/location_mentioned* in said *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*Known as *location_mentioned*League No. 20*/location_mentioned*—The foregoing sale had pursuance to the order of the *person_mentioned*Honorable superior Court */person_mentioned*ot this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*to satisfy a Mortgage in favour of *person_mentioned*Solomon Barrow*/person_mentioned*— The purchaser to be at the expence of the Titles—*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-11-1827">June 11—1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John B. Weller*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Admr of Thos Gray deceased*/p*
*/div1*
